--- title: Exposure processing keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Add exposure to each event" description: "Add exposure to each event" nb_path: "nbs/04_exposure.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

For a given source, his module takes the exposure derived from the source direction and the spacecraft data, and a list of photons, both as DataFrames. It adds a column "tau" to the data, which is the exposure per photon in units of $\mathrm{m^2 s}$

It also identifies the runs from gaps in the exposure, and returns a set of runs.

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

add_exposure_to_events[source]

add_exposure_to_events(config, exposure, photons)

Modifies the photon DF to add column "tau" Returns DataFrame runs

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

generate_exposure[source]

generate_exposure(config, livetime, pcosine)

return exposure calculated for each pair in livetime and cosines arrays

uses effective area

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
